code: import without from'lodash/without';import map from'lodash/map';import routes from'core/constants/routes';import getQueryStrings from'core/helpers/query';export var addParamCircle=function addParamCircle(history,circleId){var query=getQueryStrings();query.append('circle',circleId);history.push({pathname:routes.circlesComparation,search:query.toString()});};export var delParamCircle=function delParamCircle(history,circleId){var query=getQueryStrings();var circles=query.getAll('circle');var remaineds=without(circles,circleId);var params=new URLSearchParams();map(remaineds,function(id){return params.append('circle',id);});history.push({pathname:routes.circlesComparation,search:params.toString()});};
